hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select cdws.cdws_sku_code, cdws.cdws_cust_material_no, cdws.cdws_sku_name, cdws.cdws_cubic, cdws.cdws_gross_weight, cdws.cdws_lot_code from cd_wh_sku cdws where 1=1 <<and cdws.cdws_cust_material_no = :eooiCustomerItemNo>> <<and cdws.cdws_cust_material_no in (:eooiCustomerItemNos)>> <<and cdws.cdws_sku_code = :eooiCode>> <<and cdws.cdws_sku_code in (:eooiCodes)>> <<and cdws.cdws_owner_group_code in (select g.owner_group_code from cd_owner_group g left join cd_owner_group_detail gd on gd.owner_group_code=g.owner_group_code where gd.owner_code = :customerCode)>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
